articles.author: Anna Chernova, Frederik Pleitgen, Chris Liakos and Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Lukoil chairman dies after falling from a Moscow hospital window
articles.description: The chairman of Russian oil and gas giant Lukoil has died after falling out of the window of a hospital in Moscow, according to Russian state media.
articles.content: The chairman of Russian oil and gas giant Lukoil has died after falling out of the window of a hospital in Moscow, according to Russian state media.

articles.title: Judge orders release of detailed list of property seized in Trump FBI search
articles.description: At a hearing on Thursday, attorneys argued over whether the judge should appoint a "special master" to review the documents seized by federal agents.

articles.title: Jackson, Mississippi, residents told to shower with mouths closed as water treatment plant repairs continue on Day 4 of water shortage
articles.description: As Mississippi's capital city entered a fourth day Thursday with little or no water flowing from faucets, authorities were scrambling to get a failing water treatment plant plagued by decades of deferred maintenance back online.

articles.description: The request to the Michigan Supreme Court comes after a state regulatory agency refused to certify the proposed amendment on Wednesday.

articles.title: Putin denies Gorbachev a state funeral and will stay away
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is to miss the funeral of the last Soviet leader, Mikhail Gorbachev, denying the man who failed to prevent the collapse of the Soviet empire the full state honours granted to Boris Yeltsin.
